sentence: Republican House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy offered a rare rebuke of two members of his caucus on Monday, saying it was "unacceptable" for Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Paul Gosar of Arizona to speak at an event held by a man widely described to be white nationalist.
author: Bryan Metzger
title: Kevin McCarthy condemns Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar for attending 'appalling and wrong' white nationalist event: 'This is unacceptable'

sentence: His comments came after Greene and Arizona Representative Paul Gosar spoke at the America First Political Action Conference over the weekend conference in Florida.
author: Daniel Villarreal
title: 'Appalled' McCarthy Plans Talk With Greene About White Nationalist Rally

sentence: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-KY) and House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) slammed Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) for attending a white nationalist event.
author: Jackson Richman
title: McConnell, McCarthy Slams Greene, Gosar for Attending White Nationalist Event
